channel.title: [317] Terrafirmax [Join Now] [Fun RSPS]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ldw39w.jpg[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.terrafirmax.com/forums/"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OCvaW.gif[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2reo11j.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.terrafirmax.com/play/"]Click To Play![/URL] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2qlbpl0.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.terrafirmax.com/play/"]Download![/URL] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/16h2fbd.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://terrafirmax.com/forums/index.php"]Forums![/URL] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/308haw1.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://terrafirmax.com/index.html"]Website[/URL]
The server Terrafirmax, is a brand new server that has been worked on for about a month+. We have put over 500 hours into coding in this from a blank source. We all have experience in the rsps community and know what players want and do not want. We hope to satisfy all of our players in this unique gaming experience. Please take the time to read more about the server and it's AMAZING features.
[CENTER]Staff Team: Owner: Tom/Terrafirmax Admin: Pwntang Admin: Tylur Moderator: Max Moderator: Joey [/CENTER]
[center]Server Features[center] - 24/7 Uptime- Dedicated hosting - NEW - Runescape bonuses what you wear matters! - Highscores - Webclient, working on ALL operating systems - Perfect Pking - Active helpful staff - Huge updates! daily! - Completely Lag Free! - 100% working curses - Great Combat reworked to be perfect - Redone accuracy to be like runescape - All skills working - Many different weapon specials - Active forums - A great economy - Different minigames [/center]- A variety of modern runescape items - Many monsters to kill - Pk Points System -Auto Donation System - Working Minigames including Barrows, Jad, God wars. -All bosses are 100% working (Corporeal Beast, KBD, etc) [/CENTER]
[center]Media/Images[/center] [CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xFhMy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hxKmq.png[/img] Thieving portal [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hvqO4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kRMWT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/p0tx3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/23irl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TlTMq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tknXV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2hdCp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JjprE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y0IMd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HAYHP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iquOA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7VlS7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ag8LO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9cK05.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/63ELt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uJmij.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IdBmR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/shwoK.png[/img][/CENTER] [/spoiler]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Support Signature![/SIZE] [URL=http://"http://www.terrafirmax.com/forums/"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OCvaW.gif[/img][/URL]
Don't forget to register [URL=http://"http://www.terrafirmax.com/forums/"]HERE![/URL]
I hope you all leave feedback on this thread on what we can improve on, and or just leave a comment if you like the server. We work really hard and we love what we do for our players. Please stop by.
[SIZE=2][SIZE=3]PS: If a moderator could delete the older thread we had that would be great. We started fresh but kept with the name.[/SIZE][/SIZE]

item.title: [317] Terrafirmax [Join Now] [Fun RSPS]
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

Not unique or fresh from the looks of it. Still a bloody 317 loading 600 shit with that animated armour minigame. False advertising is false.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Terrafirmax [Join Now] [Fun RSPS]

It looks nice. Althoug I don’t like spirit shields and vesta. I might join anyway.

item.title: [317] Terrafirmax [Join Now] [Fun RSPS]
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

The only “unique” thing I really see is the PvP minigame, other than that, it looks pretty generic. Regardless, good luck!

[CENTER]

Click To Play!
Download!
Forums!
Website

The server Terrafirmax, is a brand new server that has been worked on for about a month+. We have put over 500 hours into coding in this from a blank source. We all have experience in the rsps community and know what players want and do not want. We hope to satisfy all of our players in this unique gaming experience. Please take the time to read more about the server and it’s AMAZING features.

[CENTER]Staff Team:
Owner: Tom/Terrafirmax
Admin: Pwntang
Admin: Tylur
Moderator: Max
Moderator: Joey
[/CENTER]

[center]Server Features[center]

  • 24/7 Uptime- Dedicated hosting
  • NEW - Runescape bonuses what you wear matters!
  • Highscores
  • Webclient, working on ALL operating systems
  • Perfect Pking
  • Active helpful staff
  • Huge updates! daily!
  • Completely Lag Free!
  • 100% working curses
  • Great Combat reworked to be perfect
  • Redone accuracy to be like runescape
  • All skills working
  • Many different weapon specials
  • Active forums
  • A great economy
  • Different minigames
    [/center]- A variety of modern runescape items
  • Many monsters to kill
  • Pk Points System
    -Auto Donation System
  • Working Minigames including Barrows, Jad, God wars.
    -All bosses are 100% working (Corporeal Beast, KBD, etc) [/CENTER]

[center]Media/Images[/center]

xFhMy.png691×294

Don’t forget to register HERE!

I hope you all leave feedback on this thread on what we can improve on, and or just leave a comment if you like the server. We work really hard and we love what we do for our players. Please stop by.

[SIZE=2][SIZE=3]PS: If a moderator could delete the older thread we had that would be great. We started fresh but kept with the name.[/SIZE][/SIZE]
